step_feedback.feedback: Good start! Keep your shoulders and elbows relatively stable as you begin.
Nice job reaching overhead. Focus on keeping your wrists straight as you stretch.
Great fist and squeeze! Remember to inhale as you tighten your muscles.
Well done extending back. Try to relax your wrists more as you exhale.
Good job completing the first repetition. Focus on controlled movements throughout.
Second rep starting strong. Maintain good posture and control.
Excellent overhead stretch. Continue to focus on wrist alignment.
Good fist and squeeze. Remember to breathe deeply with the movement.
Nice extension. Focus on relaxing your wrists and forearms during the exhale.
You've completed both repetitions! Overall, good control and focus on form.

exercise_summary: Great job with the Push Down Pumping exercise! You followed the instructions well, focusing on stretching overhead, making a fist, and squeezing your shoulder blades. Remember to keep your movements controlled and breathe with each phase.
